data.actual_result: Message bar extends with extra lines under the last line of text that disappear after typing again in the message (number of lines depends on how much text there is)
data.expected_result: Message bar extends with the proper number of lines
data.short_description: Typing a long message while having the search feature open adds extra lines which are unusable after closing search
data.steps_to_repro: - Search something random in a server - Type an extremely long message with the search open (7-8 lines should be enough) - Close the search feature - Observe the extra lines that are underneath the last line of text
